Text: Masterful job; thanks, your hard work is appreciated!

Don't suppose you've ran into Drive-in by Joe Lansdale?  I've looked everywhere for that and have only found a comic.  Also am looking for horror anthologies.  Sci-Fi anthologies are all over but horror ones are quite difficult to locate.

WOW!! What a fantastic job you did. I can see what I'll be doing over the next several months. I just know its greatly appreciated by myself as well as all of the other SF&F fans out here. Thank you very, very much!
